comments.body: Shouldn't we be doing this in transit from staging -> own repo?
I don't know the answer to that, but I think this is the way all our other staging repos currently do it.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +26,30 @@#                  k8s.io/kubernetes. The output-base is needed for the generators to output into the vendor dir
#                  instead of the $GOPATH directly. For normal projects this can be dropped.
${CODEGEN_PKG}/generate-groups.sh "deepcopy,client,informer,lister" \
  k8s.io/node-api/pkg/client k8s.io/node-api/pkg/apis \
  "node:v1alpha1" \
